title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles on debating technologies, covering a range of perspectives and advancements up to 2021
**"The Ethics of Artificial Intelligence"** - Nick Bostrom and Eliezer Yudkowsky
**"Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach"**
**"The Malicious Use of Artificial Intelligence: Forecasting, Prevention, and Mitigation"** - Brundage et al
**"Debating the Ethical Implications of Artificial Intelligence in Healthcare"**
**"The Future of Employment: How Susceptible Are Jobs to Computerization?"**
**"Ethics of AI: A Systematic Literature Review of Principles and Challenges"**
**"The AI Debate: Artificial Intelligence, Robotics, and the Future of Work"** - Darrell M
**"AI and the Future of Work: A Literature Review"** - Brynjolfsson and McAfee

container-title: **"The Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Innovation"**

title: **"Artificial Intelligence and the End of Work"** - Jeremy Rifkin
**"AI in Education: Challenges and Opportunities"** - Luckin et al
**"Artificial Intelligence and the Future of Warfare"** - Kenneth Payne
**"The Role of Artificial Intelligence in Achieving the Sustainable Development Goals"** - Vinuesa et al
**"Artificial Intelligence and International Security"** - Horowitz
**"AI and the Future of Cyber-Conflict"** - Brundage et al
**"AI and Ethics: A Systematic Review of the Literature"** - Hagendorff
**"Artificial Intelligence and Human Rights"** - Cath et al
**"The Promise and Peril of Artificial Intelligence"** - Tegmark
**"Ethical and Social Implications of AI"** - Floridi et al

These articles cover a broad spectrum of topics related to AI and technology, including ethical considerations, impacts on employment, implications for warfare, and the future of innovation. They provide a comprehensive overview of the debates and discussions surrounding the development and deployment of AI technologies up to
